lca_information.study_goal: To comply with procedures for creating a Type III EPD and publish for public review.
lca_information.cut_off_criteria: Minimum of 95% of total inflows included
lca_information.data_sources: Combination of primary data from Holcim and ecoinvent v3.8

additional_info.total_impact_summary: Provided for each product on a per 1m3 of concrete basis
